channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Serena Williams says talent alone only gets you so far: For career success, like tennis, you have to grind ‘every day’
item.description: The 43-year-old tennis icon says humility and perseverance are key to success, echoing other leaders like Brian Niccol, Steve Jobs, and Mark Cuban.

item.title: Interior cancels $14M annual fishing grant cited in Fox report after DOGE highlights Disney ads, salaries

item.title: How Trump Rebuffed D.C. Warmongers With One Surgical Strike Against Iran
item.description: For the first time in a generation, the United States is exclusively pursuing its vital interests, not the ambitions of its NatSec elites.

item.title: Canada rescinds digital services tax after Trump's trade threat
item.description: Canada says it plans to rescind a digital services tax that would have hit U.S. tech companies.

item.title: Do We Remember How to Be Human to One Another?
item.description: Pope Leo may just save our lives.

item.title: Robinhood plans to launch its own blockchain, offers ‘Stock Tokens’ in EU

item.description: Senate Republicans are on schedule to pass President Trump's "big, beautiful bill" on Monday, but whether enough votes exist to do so is a nail-biter.
